mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FLIGHT WHERE DEPT_DATE= TO_DATE(#{deptDate} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND DEPT_AIRPORT_CODE IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT WHERE CITY_NAME = #{deptCity}) AND ARRIVE_AIRPORT_CODE IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT WHERE CITY_NAME = #{arriveCity})
SELECT AIRLINE, COUNT(FLIGHT_ID) FLIGHT_NUM FROM FLIGHT GROUP BY AIRLINE
SELECT FLIGHT.AIRLINE AS company, AIRPORT.CITYNAME AS city, COUNT(*) AS fnumber FROM FLIGHT, AIRPORT WHERE FLIGHT.DEPT_AIRPORT_CODE = AIRPORT.AIRPORT_CODE GROUP BY COMPANY, CITY
